title: Mac/Win版：AE插件：变形3D网格插件套装 Mettle Bundle V1.75
author: 大众脸
content: Mettle公司是AE的重要插件提供商，其插件数量不多但质量精良。本次更新的Mettle Bundle V1.75插件套装新增了全景环境贴图插件SkyBox，并对其他组件进行了升级。该套装包含多个用于After Effects的3D建模与动画工具，适用于创建复杂的3D效果、文字动画、地形模拟等，适合专业视觉设计师使用。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS4, CS5, CS6, CC, CC 2014, CC 2015

other.tutorial_reference: Chris McFall 在 3D Artist Magazine 11月刊中使用 FreeForm Pro 制作液态水银标志动画教程

additional_resources.name: 点击自愿赞助 LookAE.com 网站 【送精品资源】

plugins_included.name: FreeForm V2.1
plugins_included.description: Bend, Warp and Distort a 3D layer in After Effects. Practical to create cylinders, curves, ribbons, and folds. Easy to create terrains, tunnels, animate water, character animation, and much more!

plugins_included.name: FreeForm Pro V1.75
plugins_included.description: Create a Liquid Metal Logo Animation in After Effects. Featured in the November issue of 3D Artist Magazine! Chris McFall(unitedfilmdon.com) leads us through this amazing tutorial on how to create a liquid mercury logo animation all within After Effects. He uses mettle’s FreeForm Pro plug-in to nail the effect.

plugins_included.name: ShapeShifter AE 1.75
plugins_included.description: Design and animate 3D logos directly in After Effects. Create backgrounds, 3D morphing shapes, and much more, all customizable.

plugins_included.name: SkyBox V1.12
plugins_included.description: SkyBox makes it easy to generate 360 Environment and Reflection Maps using all your favorite After Effects plug-ins. A great production tool!
